HTMLInputElementStep.summary: The step property of the interface indicates the step by which numeric or date-time {{HTMLElement("input")}} elements can change. It reflects the element's step attribute. Valid values include the string "any" or a string containing a positive floating point number. If the attribute is not explicitly set, the step property is an empty string.

remarks.para:
-input of type input/range, input/number, input/date, input/month, input/week, and input/time
-
-

HTMLInputElementStep.value: A string representing the element's step value or an empty string if no step is explicitly set.
